name: The Cocky Roach
description:
Play as a cocky roach, traverse through the office filled with dangerous adversities, and show your dominance by defecating to mark your territory!

Made during SEA Game Jam 2019. (1st Runner Up for SEA Game Jam 2019.)

Nikko Soetjoadi (Design)
Wee Jun Hun (Tech)
Stelson Lee (Tech)
Goh Weng Zen (Tech)
Bernard Yap (Design & Tech)
Yee I-Van (Artist)
